transArray.content: Great service, great room. The front desk clerk also upgraded the room. It has a large window and is very clean. The service from the little girl at the front desk was very good. They also gave me free coffee when I left the hotel. The experience was very good. Highly recommended. Their home! !
Dear guest, thank you very much for choosing. Summer has the late glow. Just like the little guy who comes late, everyone is smiling. I love you, little guy.
